content: choosing this pattern please post photos of your finished hats to ravelry and social media www shainabilow com @shaina bilow shaina bilow designs instructions round 4 *c2f k1 star twice k1 k2tog repeat from * to the end of the round 72 brim 84 96 sts rem round 5 *k10 k2tog repeat from * to the with smaller needles cast on 84 98 112 end of the round 66 77 88 sts rem stitches place a marker and being careful not to twist the stitches join the work in the round 6 * k1 star twice k1 k2tog repeat round from * to the end of the round 60 70 80 sts rem rounds 1-8 work in k1p1 ribbing round 7 *k8 k2tog repeat from * to the change to larger needle end of the round 54 63 72 sts rem round 9 *k1 m1r k7 m1r k6 repeat from * round 8 *c2f k1 star k1 k2tog repeat around 96 112 128 stitches from * to the end of the round 48 56 64 round 10 work round 2 of star stitch sts rem round 11 work round 3 of star stitch round 9 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to the round 12 work round 4 of star stitch end of the round 42 49 56 sts rem round 13 work round 1 of star stitch round 10 *k1 star k1 k2tog repeat from * to the end of the round 36 42 48 sts rem round 14 work round 2 of star stitch round 11 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to the round 15 work round 3 of star stitch end of the round 30 35 40 sts rem round 16 work round 4 of star stitch round 12 *c2f k1 k2tog repeat from * to continue repeating rounds 13-16 working the end of the round 24 28 32 sts rem rounds 1-4 of star stitch pattern until the round 13 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to the hat measures 5 5 6 5 7 from the cast-on end of the round 18 21 24 sts rem edge ending after completing a round 16 round 14 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to the crown shaping end of the round 12 14 16 sts rem switch to dpn when stitches become too round 15 *k2tog repeat from * to the end tight on the circular needles of the round 6 7 8 sts rem round 1 k12 14 total sts are on the right- cut the yarn leaving a 10 tail thread the hand needle from the bor marker k2tog tail onto a tapestry needle and pull the *k14 k2tog repeat from * to the end of the yarn through the remaining stitches to round 90 105 120 sts rem secure them round 2 * k1 star 3 times k1 k2tog repeat from * to the end of the round 84 98 112 sts rem finishing round 3 *k12 k2tog repeat from * to the weave in tails block
